mapper.select: select g.articleno, g.userid, g.subject, g.content, g.regtime, m.username from guestbook g, ssafy_member m where g.userid = m.userid
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook(userid, subject, content) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set g.subject = #{subject}, g.content = #{content} from guestbook g
